## NoDataRendererTexts interface

Texts that are used within NoDataRenderer

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface NoDataRendererTexts 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [loading](./grid.nodatarenderertexts.loading.md) | <code>string</code> | Text that should be displayed when there is no data and data are loaded |
|  [noData](./grid.nodatarenderertexts.nodata.md) | <code>string</code> | Text that should be displayed when there is no data available |
|  [notLoaded](./grid.nodatarenderertexts.notloaded.md) | <code>string</code> | Text that should be displayed when data were not loaded yet, before first obtaining of data |
